page.title: 05TYPES OF HOUSING, HARROW.
page.content:
A large part of Harrow is a very popular residential area, being so close to{London.}It also has the advantage of being close to the {Greenbelt}for easy access to the rural areas.
The types of housing in this part of Harrow are many and varied, including many spacious, desirable residences; semi-detached houses; small terraced houses built at the turn of the century; council estates and older buildings with a history.
Large estates were built with the introduction of the{railway.}These estates were often built on sites once occupied by large houses with their own grounds; for example, the Woodhall estate.
